evidence.text: a. Declare unlawful Defendants’ actions eliminating the Job Corps program, including but not limited to the issuance of termination and non-renewal notices by DOL starting on May 29, 2025;

e. Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, and all persons acting in concert or participation with Defendants from enforcing, implementing, maintaining or giving effect to the elimination of the Job Corps program, including the stop work orders and termination and non-renewal notices delivered to Job Corps center operators starting May 29, 2025;
h. Award Plaintiffs costs, reasonable attorneys’ fees, and other disbursements as appropriate;

add_extracted.value: Award of costs and reasonable attorneys' fees
